Always wait for the WEBDL version of BrBa; always good quality and posted without being RAR'd.

The IMMERSE versions always have people complaining about the quality and RARhead scenebalance thinks it is posting to newsgroups and can't take a second to unRAR the stuff before posting it and we'd like to discourage that so try to always get the UNRAR version even if it means you have to wait a bit for it.

I dl 8+GB unRAR'd torrents all the time and there's no problem with them.  People who insist on RAR's are confusing NNTP with torrents - just because it was an appropriate packaging method for one DOES NOT make it useful for the other so get with it folks!
Works fine. Unrar's fine.

@lailabagge 
the reason RARs are posted is because they come straight off USENET as binary files, which have to be broken into smaller files. 


so its a choice between waiting longer for it to be posted online, or the inconvenience of you having to press unzip. 

if you have no idea why people do things in a certain way, abusing people is no answer, as its usually YOU who doesnt understand.............
there are lots of users seeding 100% of the files now, the "stuck on 99,9%" problem is GONE now, this torrent is OK on this point.
